TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_tangila, title = tangila, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/tangila} }

S.FORM: == Tangila == u tangila kuyni.這是耳朵. u tangila ita ku sapitengil tu dadiw.我們用耳朵聆聽歌曲. kelekeleng ku tapuku masangil ku tangila aku.天空打雷我耳朵很吵. anu mipuyuh amana saungay masaita ku tangila. . tabaki ku tangila nu zo.大象耳朵很大. hina kiwkiw kaku tu tangila yu mamin mililuc.我洗完澡後喜歡掏耳.

== Tangila == o tangila koyni.這是耳朵. o tangila ita ko sapitengil to dadiw.我們用耳朵聆聽歌曲. kelekeleng ko tapoko masangil ko tangila ako.天空打雷我耳朵很吵. ano mipoyoh amana saongay masaita ko tangila. . tabaki ko tangila no zo.大象耳朵很大. hina kiwkiw kako to tangila yo mamin mililoc.我洗完澡後喜歡掏耳.
